    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeCamera

        public NodeCamera(Node node,
          Vector2D offset,
          Vector3D eye,
          Vector3D center,
          Vector3D up,
          float angleDeg,
          float near,
          float far)
        Creates a new Camera which is following a Node with an offset
        Parameters:
        node - the node has to be followed
        offset - the offset value from the center
        eye - the position of the camera
        center - the position wherever the camera looks
        up - the orientation of the camera
        angle - the angle of view in degrees
        near - the near value of depth of field
        far - the far value of depth of field

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate(long gameTime)
        Updates the camera with a delta time
        Overrides:
        onUpdate in class Camera
        Parameters:
        gameTime - the elapsed time since last update
